DESCRIPTION: Create a new card and add it to your hand.
Burning creatures take damage at the start of your turn. Each turn, Burn is reduced by #b1.
Provides #yEnergy and #ySnow each turn, based on its temperature. Temperature ranges from Frozen to Overheated.
Pressurized cards are more effective the more unspent #yEnergy you have.
Used by cards and can be converted to #yEnergy at the cost of cooling your #yEngine.
If this creature is #yBurning, its #yBurn increases instead of decreasing.
Modify a card to apply an additional effect.
Effect is lost at the end of this turn.
Requires and consumes #ySnowballs to trigger an extra effect.
Exhausts. Greatly heats your #yEngine, grants [E] when played, and repeats the card's effect.
Exhausts. Heats your #yEngine and grants [E] when played.
Retains. Cools your #yEngine and draws a card when played.
Retains. Greatly cools your #yEngine, draws a card, and grants a #ySnowball when played.
Raise a card's temperature. Temperature ranges from Frozen to Overheated.
Lower a card's temperature. Temperature ranges from Frozen to Overheated.
Temperature ranges from Frozen to Overheated.
